column5: How about "blade runner" on the sleeves? HH
i also think zing the bling would be killer over the back shoulders! logo looks awesome mike. cant wait to grab a shirt when im back in town.
Lmk when your back Ron I'm guessing you will be back before musky season? If so we might have to do some walleye.

Nice looking Logo Mike. Can't wait to put the sticker on my boat, I'm sure it will cover up a big ding lmao All kidding aside looking forward to getting some of these, maybe even a shirt.  Let me know when you have them, not sure I'm going to make it to the oddysey now. My sister in law decided to have my nephew Christened the same day, I get a month notice for that, but knew about the Oddysey a year ago, decisions decisions lol

Hey everyone I just wanted to share my new logo with the OFC family. I have been working with Slowpokes friend on a logo he is a awesome person to work with as everything I talked about turned into this logo which I totally love. This is just the black and white version I will share the full colour one later when I get the good picture in. Lmk what you think.
Looks good Mike, I like it !!
It's a great logo Mike. Well done! Looking forward to seeing the colour version too!
looks great mike - really awesome

Thanks guys for anyone wanting a shirt I will have them at the odyssey. Lmk sizes you all need for anyone wanting a saved I would need a deposit If not I will have limited quantities  John check your text messages I sent you one yesterday.
Do I get a decal with my next order????
cool logo looks great mike !!!!
Yup - I like it  !!
Love the Logo Mike.. can not wait for the colored version. PM sent
Love it...
what colour are the shirts? are they tshirts only or sweaters also?
Very cool.

Thanks again Guys  As for the shirts they will be black with white logo on the front it will be about 11" diamiter. I can get sweat shirts but they will be limited to per sell only as they cost alot more to get in and he does not stock them so what I want I have to order he said I can order just 1 or 100 he will just have them sent with another order of shirts that was cool so I dont have to make a huge order. LMK Boss if you want one of them they would be Gilden hoodies with the white logo on the back.  As for the regluar shirts I have been toying with the ideas of words on the back any ideas weather to go this route or not? What I was thinking was my catch phrase Zing The Bling!!! across the upper shoulder area and maybey something written under neith about the lures or musky fishing but not to much.  Thanks again to Slowpoke for hooking me up with his friend and also to all the members who have tried to help me with a logo over the last 3 years.
Love it Mike, very cool
Looks fantastic Mike!!
Looks good Mr Parker
Thanks Joey will and Phil.
Sweet looking logo Mike -
I would go with  BELIEVE just under your logo but not to big as to take away from the logo.  I would also like to know where I can find your stuff north of GTA?  Don.
Really nice job!!
yawn....  NAH, I'M JUST KIDDING! LOOKS GREAT MIKE! Yes, I'm yelling. Long sleeve in black for those cold days in the Spring and Fall please 2X.  What's that saying? Oh ya, the cheque is in the mail.

Don as of right now you can find some lures at sunny achers camp ground in there store. I have done phone calls to make for some other stores will update as soon as they are a done deal. Figure 8 baits in kenora also has them.  Thanks Pete Ronnie as always what ever you need I got ya covered and I must get you my new address as the mail man keeps missing the house.
